CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1962, pg. 2, reads: "Cream Of The Crop - Representative of some of the best Pittsburgh has to offer the future are these six youngsters, shown with two of their mentors, who were named winners of $500 scholarship awards at The COurier's recent Appreciation Day Rally at Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall...Lower left photo shows the winners on the high school level, left to right: Leslie Cyrus, graduate of Westinghouse High School; Arnita Pyles, recent graduate of Schenley High School, and Verita E. Lee, who established a fine record at Fifth Avenue High School..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left, Verita E. Lee, Leslie Cyrus, and Arnita Pyles, standing on stage at Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall during Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper's Appreciation Day Rally
CatSubject_tab: Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Young adults--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
